global.schema:
type AtlasFoundationState {
  name: String
  docNo: String
  parent: PHID!
  atlasType: FAtlasType! 
  content: String
  masterStatus: FStatus!
  globalTags: [FGlobalTag!]!
  references: [PHID!]!
  originalContextData: [PHID!]!
  provenance: URL
  notionId: String
}

enum FAtlasType {
ARTICLE
SECTION
CORE
ACTIVE_DATA_CONTROLLER
}

enum FStatus {
  PLACEHOLDER
  PROVISIONAL
  APPROVED
  DEFERRED
  ARCHIVED
}

enum FGlobalTag {
  SCOPE_ADVISOR_
  AVC_
  CAIS_
  ML_LOW_PRIORITY_
  EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_
  DAO_TOOLKIT_
  ML_DEFER_
  PURPOSE_SYSTEM_
  NEWCHAIN_
  ML_SUPPORT_DOCS_NEEDED_
  TWO_STAGE_BRIDGE_
  ECOSYSTEM_INTELLIGENCE_
  RECURSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_
  LEGACY_TERM_USE_APPROVED_
}

operations.name: UPDATE_FOUNDATION
operations.description: Updates an existing Foundational document type.
operations.schema:
input UpdateFoundationInput {
  name: String
  atlasType: FAtlasType!
  content: String
  masterStatus: [FStatus!]
  globalTags: [FGlobalTag!]
  references: [PHID!]
}


enum FAtlasType {
ARTICLE
SECTION
CORE
ACTIVE_DATA_CONTROLLER
}

enum FStatus {
  PLACEHOLDER
  PROVISIONAL
  APPROVED
  DEFERRED
  ARCHIVED
}

enum FGlobalTag {
  SCOPE_ADVISOR_
  AVC_
  CAIS_
  ML_LOW_PRIORITY_
  EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_
  DAO_TOOLKIT_
  ML_DEFER_
  PURPOSE_SYSTEM_
  NEWCHAIN_
  ML_SUPPORT_DOCS_NEEDED_
  TWO_STAGE_BRIDGE_
  ECOSYSTEM_INTELLIGENCE_
  RECURSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_
  LEGACY_TERM_USE_APPROVED_
}

operations.name: POPULATE_FOUNDATION
operations.description: Populates a Foundational document type with live data.
operations.schema:
input PopulateFoundationInput {
  name: String
  docNo: String
  parent: PHID!
  atlasType: FAtlasType! 
  content: String
  masterStatus: FStatus!
  globalTags: [FGlobalTag!]
  references: [PHID!]
  originalContextData: [PHID!]
  provenance: URL
  notionId: String
}

enum FAtlasType {
ARTICLE
SECTION
CORE
ACTIVE_DATA_CONTROLLER
}


enum FStatus {
  PLACEHOLDER
  PROVISIONAL
  APPROVED
  DEFERRED
  ARCHIVED
}

enum FGlobalTag {
  SCOPE_ADVISOR_
  AVC_
  CAIS_
  ML_LOW_PRIORITY_
  EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_
  DAO_TOOLKIT_
  ML_DEFER_
  PURPOSE_SYSTEM_
  NEWCHAIN_
  ML_SUPPORT_DOCS_NEEDED_
  TWO_STAGE_BRIDGE_
  ECOSYSTEM_INTELLIGENCE_
  RECURSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_
  LEGACY_TERM_USE_APPROVED_
}
